participant_1.name: George
participant_1.personality: George is a laid-back individual with a love for nature and farming. He has a unique perspective on life, shaped by his experiences with a high-profile spouse.
participant_1.background: i married a super model from italy. my favorite food is papaya. i've zero family that i'm close to. i'm a bee farmer. my name is george.

participant_2.name: Lena
participant_2.personality: Lena is an adventurous and spirited person who enjoys trying new things. She is passionate about health and wellness, often seeking out fun ways to stay active.
participant_2.background: i love rollercoasters and sky diving. i'm a vegan and i love hummus. hello i just moved here from germany. i do like watching cooking shows.

content.text: Hi, I just moved here from Germany
